title: Scaffolding-Based Dental Simulation Practical Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic dental procedure protocols and anatomical knowledge
context.additional_context: Blended education using digital simulation equipment and phantom head models, aimed at enhancing the proficiency of current practitioners. Evaluation results are utilized as a progression condition for patient care practicums.

learning_goals: Understand the fundamental principles of vortex formation and apply them step-by-step.
Perform simple caries treatment procedures with 80% accuracy using simulation equipment.
Develop treatment plans for complex proximal caries based on feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
